message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product to you today. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $200 to start.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a price closer to $140. Would you be willing to consider that?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $140 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $170. I believe this product will really benefit you.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $155?
